item.title: Epson EcoTank ET-4760 Special Edition Wireless WiFi Printer
item.dc:creator: ecom08_admin
item.description:
• Includes 1 Set of EcoTank Ink, Plus One Bonus Bottle of Black Ink
  • Refillable Ink Tanks for Cartridge-Free Printing
  • Wireless Printing From Smartphone or Tablet
  • Compatible with Epson T502 Black and Color Ink
  • Print Speed: 15 Black / 8 Color Pages Per Minute

item.title: Epson Workforce Pro WF-3820 Wireless Printer
item.dc:creator: ecom08_admin
item.description: Bring a new level of productivity to your business with the ultra-efficient WorkForce Pro WF-3820 all-in-one printer. Designed for high-volume print environments, the WF-3820 delivers precise, professional-quality prints at fast speeds up to 21 (black)/11 (color) ISO ppm ( ) using vibrant DURABrite Ultra instant-dry pigment inks. A breakthrough in business printing, the WF-3820 features Epson’s innovative PrecisionCore Heat-Free Technology designed for enhanced reliability with minimal downtime. Built with convenience in mind, the WF-3820 offers a variety of user-friendly features to support easy, streamlined printing for small workgroups, including auto 2-sided printing, a large, 250-sheet paper capacity, built-in wireless, and a 2.7" color touchscreen for quick navigation and control.
item.content:encoded: Bring a new level of productivity to your business with the ultra efficient WorkForce Pro WF-3820 all-in-one printer. Designed for high-volume print environments, the WF-3820 delivers precise, professional-quality prints at fast speeds up to 21 (black)/11 (color) ISO ppm ( ) using vibrant DURABrite Ultra instant-dry pigment inks. A breakthrough in business printing, the WF-3820 features Epson’s innovative PrecisionCore Heat-Free Technology designed for enhanced reliability with minimal downtime. Built with convenience in mind, the WF-3820 offers a variety of user-friendly features to support easy, streamlined printing for small workgroups, including auto 2-sided printing, a large, 250-sheet paper capacity, built-in wireless and a 2.7″ color touchscreen for quick navigation and control. This product uses only genuine Epson-brand cartridges. Other brands of ink cartridges and ink supplies are not compatible and, even if described as compatible, may not function properly. Black and color print speeds are measured in accordance with ISO/IEC 24734. Actual print times will vary based on factors including system configuration, software, and page complexity. For more information, visit our official site.1. Requires Epson Smart Panel app download and a compatible smart device. Data usage fees may apply. For more information, please visit our official site.2. Most features require an Internet connection to the printer, as well as an Internet- and/or email-enabled device.

item.title: Epson Expression Home XP 4000 Series Wireless Printer
item.dc:creator: ecom08_admin
item.description: The sleek Epson Expression XP Series wireless all-in-one offers auto 2-sided printing and other high performance features for efficient everyday home printing. Featuring a 2.4" color LCD for simple setup and navigation, the XP Series makes it easy to wirelessly print, copy, and scan documents and photos. Print from your iPad, iPhone, Android tablet or smartphone. Affordable individual ink cartridges mean you only replace the color that runs out. And, hands-free voice-activated functionality allows for easy printing, on command. Get truly touchable photos and documents with instant-dry ink all from a compact printer with a convenient space-saving design.
item.content:encoded: The sleek Epson Expression XP Series wireless all-in-one offers auto 2-sided printing and other high-performance features for efficient everyday home printing. Featuring a 2.4″ color LCD for simple setup and navigation, the XP Series makes it easy to wirelessly print, copy, and scan documents and photos. Print from your iPad, iPhone, Android tablet, or smartphone. Affordable individual ink cartridges mean you only replace the color that runs out. And, hands-free voice-activated functionality allows for easy printing, on command. Get truly touchable photos and documents with instant-dry ink all from a compact printer with a convenient space-saving design.

item.content:encoded: Experience the force of superior business printing with the WorkForce Pro WF-4820. Giving high-velocity printing, the WF-4820 bursts through high-volume print occupations at a shocking 25 dark/12 shading ISO ppm ( ). Worked for usefulness, this solid printer reliably conveys sharp, proficient quality prints with creative PrecisionCore Heat-Free Technology and striking DURABrite Ultra moment dry color inks. An effective, simple-to-utilize arrangement, the WF-4820 offers advantageous highlights intended to upgrade proficiency and smooth out the work process, including a huge, 4.3″ shading touchscreen for natural route, a 250-sheet paper limit, auto 2-sided printing, remote availability, and the sky is the limit from there. This item utilizes just certified Epson-brand cartridges. Different brands of ink cartridges and ink supplies are not viable and, regardless of whether portrayed as viable, may not work as expected.

item.title: Epson Workforce Pro WF-4720
item.dc:creator: ecom08_admin
item.description: The fast, ultra proficient across-the-board printer for little workgroups. Get rapid printing and improved efficiency for your little workgroup with the WorkForce Pro WF-4720 across-the-board printer.
item.content:encoded: The fast, ultra proficient across-the-board printer for little workgroups. Get rapid printing and improved efficiency for your little workgroup with the WorkForce Pro WF-4720 across-the-board printer. Controlled by progressive PrecisionCore innovation, the WF-4720 conveys Performance Beyond Laser and print-shop-quality prints with laser-sharp content. Including the quickest shading print speed in its group, the WF-4720 blasts through proficient quality reports. What’s more, it’s’ prudent, presenting to 50 percent lower printing costs versus shading laser. Its 250-sheet paper limit implies you’ll reload paper less frequently. Furthermore, it’s anything but a 35-page Auto Document Feeder and auto 2-sided printing. Joining incredible execution with a reduced plan, it offers extraordinary efficiency.4-in-1 with Wi-Fi Ethernet: Print/Copy/Scan/FaxInk: 4-shading DURABrite Ultra shade inkISO Print Speed: Black: 20.0 ISO ppm; Color: 20 ISO ppm
